def: The dysentery, a disease in which the flux or discharge fromthe bowels has a mixture of blood. Arbuthnot.
The dried twigs of a Syrian tree (Balsamodendron Gileadense).U. S. Disp.
A long lock of hair hanging prominently by itself; an earlock;-- worn by men of fashion in the reigns of Elizabeth and James I.Burton.A long lovelock and long hair he wore. Sir W. Scott.
One who grasps or seizes; one who catches or holds.
The quality or state of being suspensible.
The head violinist or leader of the strings in an orchestra;the sub-leader of the orchestra; concert master.
A remarkable genus of marine worms having tentacles around themouth. It is usually classed with the gephyreans. Its larva(Actinotrocha) undergoes a peculiar metamorphosis.
To desire strongly; to feel an insatiable longing; as, acraving appetite.Once one may crave for love. Suckling.
A double fluoride of boron and hydrogen, or some other positiveelement, or radical; -- called also fluoboride, and formerlyfluoborate.
